about_the_game:
Realistic Field Lacrosse in a Tiny Package

Mini Lax 24 is a Bite-Sized yet in-depth Lacrosse simulation/auto-battler and management game. Take the role of GM for a brand new Lacrosse team and draft your way to the championship in rapid, statistics packed seasons. Randomly generated teams and players means infinite replayability as you try to cement your legacy as a true dynasty GM.

Draft

Players draft a lacrosse team across 10 rounds and then compete for the championship in a 7 game regular season + 3 game playoff. Upgrade your team, make trades, set strategies and win it all.

True To The Sport

Many hours went into creating an accurate but still accessible simulation of the sport we know and love, 10v10 field lacrosse. Enjoy realistic outcomes based entirely on your players statistics and team strategies.

Customization

Change any of the teams to any team you would like! You can now play as any team you can imagine. Add yourself to the draft pool as well to draft yourself to your own team and win the championship.

Challenges

A variety of achievements will challenge you to approach each draft differently as you try to become a HOF Lacrosse GM / Head Coach. Can you become a true dynasty GM?

--

Thank you to all the indigenous communities for sharing their game.

This game features randomly generated names. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.
